only lead to character normalization or everyone playing the same class.", 'Diablo 3 was fun as hell even with the irony of that statement.', 'I suggest own both of them regardless if you love action RPGs because so far they are both fun to own.', 'But this is not fun kind of challenging.', 'Diablo has always had a strong loot basing as well as being fun to play.', 'There are way too many options to justify $60 on this game when you can make far far better use of your money elsewhere with far less frustration and likely more and longer fun.', 'The game is decently fun and brings back some memories of the first two, which I played over and over for hours upon end.', 'A normal (not tech savy) user would never be able to do this with instructions, much less figure it out on their own.Is the game fun?', "One of the best PC series is back and after several years there's finally a sequel, I've played this game the past 2 weeks and left my PS3 forgotten hehe, but the truth is Blizzard really know how to make gaming fun even after you finished the game and the game was a great addition to the legacy, here are my thoughts:Gameplay:Great, all classes have been enhanced and improved and there's a lot to discover and several hours fun you will get not just by beating the game but by leveling up, gaining new skills, combining these new skills to build up the perfect set of techniques for each battle, even with the same class the skills you select make you fight and play in several different ways and of course the armor and weapons, you will fin yourself playing for hours and hours just to find the next great addition to your swords collection or that nice looking helm that boosts up your strength, etc.. And of course, then the difficulties will make you want the play the game all over again to gain more items, armor, money, skills, etc.. and prove yourself as a grand hero.", "One of the best PC series is back and after several years there's finally a sequel, I've played this game the past 2 weeks and left my PS3 forgotten hehe, but the truth is Blizzard really know how to make gaming fun even after you finished the game and the game was a great addition to the legacy, here are my thoughts:Gameplay:Great, all classes have been enhanced and improved and there's a lot to discover and several hours fun you will get not just by beating the game but by leveling up, gaining new skills, combining these new skills to build up the perfect set of techniques for each battle, even with the same class the skills you select make you fight and play in several different ways and of course the armor and weapons, you will fin yourself playing for hours and hours just to find the next great addition to your swords collection or that nice looking helm that boosts up your strength, etc.. And of course, then the difficulties will make you want the play the game all over again to gain more items, armor, money, skills, etc.. and prove yourself as a grand hero.", "Multiplayer experience is great too and simple, your friends can join your game or you can join theirs and play both together with the same or even more fun, you can also join public games or make your game public to party with other people, your loot is your own and you won't have any issues with anyone, in fact you will end up trading and buying\\selling items in the Auction House and it is fun.", "Multiplayer experience is great too and simple, your friends can join your game or you can join theirs and play both together with the same or even more fun, you can also join public games or make your game public to party with other people, your loot is your own and you won't have any issues with anyone, in fact you will end up trading and buying\\selling items in the Auction House and it is fun.", "The quest system is fun, and although it's kind of strange to have a general chat but no one around, it doesn't bother me.", 'Story is solid, game is fun to play and challenging at times.', "The game isn't perfect nor is it ground-breaking, but it is a lot of fun.", 'Like I said, it\'s not exactly "raising the bar" or "setting a new standard" for action-RPGs, but it\'s an addictively fun hack and slash game that I can see keeping me busy for a good part of the summer.', 'I don\'t get a sense like i did in D2 that this is "my unique character build".- replay ability ( i fear that once i level up about 3-4 different characters there will be no need for me to start a new "build" of the same class with different stats, skills b/c i can just change or upate the skills of my current character)  something i did countless times in Diablo 2- can only handle 4 players in multiplayer (D2 had 8)Overall still very fun and i feel blizzard is really committed to making everything balanced and feels right no matter what skills you are trying to use.', "Either way, it's fun and the replay value should be incredible.", 'Anyhow....Diablo 3 is basically Gauntlet on speed with RPG levelling and Fancy equipment upgrades, and man it is a fun diversion.', 'WoW is still having a major negative impact on an interesting and innovative MMO coming out, because there is so much pressure to if not be a lot like WoW, to at least sell a lot of copies like WoW.I love action RPGs, but playing Diablo III has me convinced that Blizzard will fumble with patches, the obligatory expansion, and maybe a self degrading sequel because they started with the "how can we make a ton of money off of Diablo" foot and not the "what would be something cool, new, and fun to do with the franchise" foot.', 'Game is highly polished and fun for what it is.', "I've had a lot of fun getting into it and the cut scenes are very well produced (you can tell Blizzard spent a lot of money and time putting this together).", 'The story is quite enjoyable and the cut scenes are fun to watch, they are timed to not  interfere with the gameplay.', 'if you enjoyed the previous Diablo titles than you will most certainly have fun with this game.', 'This is not a wander around game questing and having a little fun, its pretty much all fighting.', 'Sad.4) multi-player would be fun but it has a big flaw which way curbs the fun quota.', 'Sad.4) multi-player would be fun but it has a big flaw which way curbs the fun quota.', "And this is coming from someone who spent over 100 hours on it and beat the game on Inferno with my Wizard so I've given the game more than its fair chance.The first couple of times of beating the game are very fun, especially with friends, I will hand it to Blizzard.", "The only ones that I really find fun are the Monk and the Witchdoctor, but wall of zombies was bit of a buzz kill...  Maybe they'll add more classes if they do an expansion.", 'Which makes it frustratingly fun.', "I'm more concerned about having fun when I play video games.Overall I think Diablo 3 is fun.", "I'm more concerned about having fun when I play video games.Overall I think Diablo 3 is fun.", "Got a monk to level 35 and am working through Nightmare level now... and I'm having major fun.", 'Blizzard does story very, very well (and, yeah, Act IV seemed a little rushed, but it was still good).Achievements and unlocks are ACCOUNT WIDE rather than per character, and death is treated much like it is in World of Warcraft: Equipment durability loss and having to resurrect at the last checkpoint.Thanks, Blizzard, for making an accessible, fun, beautiful Diablo game.', 'Part of the fun was picking the way you want your character to be played, and you had to commit.', "If, however, you like a more retro, old school approach to the classic action RPG genre, you'll get plenty of fun from Diablo 3.", "The classes are fun to play, if not altogether novel, as some of them combine elements of others we've seen--and enjoyed--before.", "It's fun to be social and invite others to group with me without the loot pressures of an MMO (i.e.", 'I find that I love the magical powers, I have played the wizard, which was pretty awesome, and then I played the witch doctor until I unfortunately died on level 8 of hardcore.Finally something that my boyfriend and I can do together and have fun doing.', 'Playing on a Mac and finding it to be a lot of fun.', 'Diablo 3 is an ok fun game to play, however with server connections required to play that takes away the fun, leaving just an ok game.', 'Diablo 3 is an ok fun game to play, however with server connections required to play that takes away the fun, leaving just an ok game.', 'The true fun of the game has always been about playing online co-operatively.', "I'm glad to have bought D3 and find it fun and challenging while not being the same game that was released 12 yrs ago.", "The game is extremely fun the first playthrough (probably 30 hours if you're actually watching the movies, etc.).", 'Blizz makes fun games, and spares no expense for production values.', "Where is the fun of being able to finally get a piece of armor to fit, or to be able to finally use a weapon that you've been saving up in your stash for like 3 levels, till you can up your strength enough to use it?", "I've actually had a lot of fun playing with a few friends online, and yes, they were both Demon Hunters (a class I would have picked myself, if my friend hadn't already pick it).", "That verdict is still up in the air, but so far the fun factor is there, being able to play with friends online is pretty darn awesome (haven't really seen any of the load times I had gotten used to when I used to play co-op in part II, and we would enter a new dungeon), but there are still parts that I really do miss.", 'Thanks for making a fun game...I was just hoping that I could thank you for making a "GREAT" game.5/30/2012 - OK, had to update it and bump it down one star (it would have been half a star if I could, since I would have originally rated it 3.5 stars).', "What was the point in that patch, anyway?I'm still having fun playing, and I still think co-op is the way to go.", "I've got a Monk, Demon Hunter, Barbarian and Wizard, and so far they are all really fun to play (think I like the Monk the best still, with the hand to hand prowess as well as a summoned ally to fight along with you, but the Wizard has some pretty cool spells as well.", 'It really just isn\'t a fun game.I understand if you are like me and you "have" to play the game.', 'Very polished, good aesthetics, great music and effects, and most importantly fun gameplay.', "It's Diablo, simple, mindless fun.", "It's a fun game and I'm happy that I got it.", "I loved D1 and D2,and I am going to love this game,too.I already do.There is nothing more fun in a game than to kill wave after
skeletons

column84: ["Needless to say, it can be fun to grind eq hoping for that small gain in power, but it's VERY repetitive grinding the same areas over and over and crafting LOTS of times to get something decent (which requires grinding for resources).Blizzard did a lot of work revamping this game and many improvements were made (I added 2 stars as a result).", 'The game is honestly not that fun to play, the story was ehhhh and the dynamics of the game were... well not that dynamic.', 'We all know that playing on line games are not fun when you play with other people.', 'I beat the game in 13 hours and it was fun, but not worth the money.', 'This is a fun game!', '+ Graphics+ Gameplay+ Items+ Character customization- Higher difficulties are not fun at all- Had my account hackedThis game starts off as a ton of fun if you are into these sorts of mindless clicking and killing and picking up items games, especially if your friends are into it also.', '+ Graphics+ Gameplay+ Items+ Character customization- Higher difficulties are not fun at all- Had my account hackedThis game starts off as a ton of fun if you are into these sorts of mindless clicking and killing and picking up items games, especially if your friends are into it also.', 'Where its value drops off is after about the 2nd or 3rd playthrough and you are on the harder difficulty levels, it just stops being fun, to me at least.', "I heard they will be releasing an expansion which is sorly needed as the game is kind of short and afterwards there isn't much to do other than log in from time to time to slay demons and play through the game again which is fun in itself but gets boring.", 'made a few "promises" and at launch failed to deliver all of them and even now with all the updates still have a few "promises" they have yet to deliver.That being said it was still a fun game to me.', "The game is a lot of fun, I got hundreds of hours out of it, but in the end it's just not what it was supposed to be.", "There is just something about the hellish/demonic angle of the game, the utter fun of hacking'n'slashing all these demons into a red gooey mess with body parts flying everywhere and of course the shiny loot gathering.", 'The online game is very fun', 'They didnt - and the auction house addition, using game gold, is fun.', 'The game is a lot of fun at first but after awhile the luster fades and it gets annoying and frustrating and all the fun goes away.', 'The game is a lot of fun at first but after awhile the luster fades and it gets annoying and frustrating and all the fun goes away.', 'That said the game was fun and polished.', '"The game is still 0 fun.', 'I for one am not a fan boy of Diablo I just think it is a fun game.', 'No pvp still, useless drops for all classes, doing the same dungeon over and over, no new content, no epic battles, nothing redeeming.I had fun through Inferno the first time, when it was "time" to grind to get better gear, it just became apparent how lacking the game is once you hit end game.', "It is as if Blizzard no longer cares about actual fun and game play they are focused on making money and that's it.To this day the game still has an extremely unbalanced feel to it, i cannot image the difference between my Demon Hunter and Witch Doctor.", "Don't get me wrong though, this game is a lot of fun and it's worth it to run through it with each of the classes.- Targeting/attack system is too sensitive.", "I've rated it a 3 because I have no previous game time in the Diablo series, and because I did have fun playing my trial character.", "The major way you'll receive upgrades in this game is buy collecting gold/using real world money and buying items off their auction house, which leads me to my major complaint.Last week I decided to sell off all of my items and quit the game since it's not fun at all anymore (unlike Diablo 2, which was fun for over five years for me).", "The major way you'll receive upgrades in this game is buy collecting gold/using real world money and buying items off their auction house, which leads me to my major complaint.Last week I decided to sell off all of my items and quit the game since it's not fun at all anymore (unlike Diablo 2, which was fun for over five years for me).", "It saddens me that a game I had been waiting for seven years has completely destroyed how I feel about Blizzard.Thanks Blizzard, it was a fun 14 years.Update 8/2/2012Still haven't received the money from my one auction.", "This doesn't mean it won't be fun using a specific class/skills to overpower everyone.", 'Blizzard, it is not fun to have to farm farm farm farm farm gold just to BUY gear from the AH.', "Play the game till it's no longer fun, then play something else.", 'The game is fun for a little while, the story is boring and seems like it was written by a 13 year old who is writing a short story for class.', 'I played this game for close to 200 hours in a failed attempt to get some fun out of it.', 'This game is all about the fun of looking on the auction house for gear to beat a level.', 'Who thought mechanics that can one shot kill you were fun?I also want to mention that the game lags like no other.', 'That makes the game even more fun with lag!Game is terrible.', 'It is not fun in the slightest when you get to Inferno.', "Listing too many specific instances doesn't give the reader a since of my frustration or disappointment.So here goes:The patches they had added don't address the real issues and sometimes make the game even less fun.The game appears to not have been tested much at all for inferno levels.The game looses its fun factor extremely fast once you hit inferno.Legendary gear is completely worthless.All the fun affixes that Diablo 2 had are replaced by utterly boring and worthless affixes.You don't feel more powerful as you reach high levels.Grinding gear is slow, painful, and boring for inferno.The voice over acting is horrible.The plot line is thin.The character lines are cheesy, cliche ridden garbage that try to be funny but aren't.", "Listing too many specific instances doesn't give the reader a since of my frustration or disappointment.So here goes:The patches they had added don't address the real issues and sometimes make the game even less fun.The game appears to not have been tested much at all for inferno levels.The game looses its fun factor extremely fast once you hit inferno.Legendary gear is completely worthless.All the fun affixes that Diablo 2 had are replaced by utterly boring and worthless affixes.You don't feel more powerful as you reach high levels.Grinding gear is slow, painful, and boring for inferno.The voice over acting is horrible.The plot line is thin.The character lines are cheesy, cliche ridden garbage that try to be funny but aren't.", 'Here we go...>>>I just want to put out there...it doesnt matter how long a company has been established , Blizzard ultimately failed at this game.There are so many problems with the game that have ruined what was once fun about the diablo series.', 'the game also takes away the fun when you realize everything is  "cookie cutter."', 'you are playing blizzards way, you are not playing your way.once you see these problems clearly, there is no more fun for the game, the replay-ability is gone.', "It's not fun at all, just 100% guaranteed death and disappointment because you know your death will be based not on a miss-step, but on an undefeatable foe.-CHINESE BOT-FARM AUCTION HALL-Auto farming bots that farm gold 24/7 have already inflated auction hall prices into the millions of gold for a single item.", "I'm not sure what progress they made on that front, but they really dented the fun factor for casual players like myself.", 'The game is not fun at all, what is the motivation to buy items for a game that is not fun at all.What an utter and complete piece of crap they have developed.', 'The game is not fun at all, what is the motivation to buy items for a game that is not fun at all.What an utter and complete piece of crap they have developed.', 'The game feels even more arcade-like than its predecessor with big, flashy fights that are a lot of fun (if a little confusing at times).', 'Game is stable, looks good and plays great.As others have said, the biggest issue with this game is the community, so much anger with little to base it on.The game play is fun and there is a lot to see, levels/quests are very large to huge and (unlike previous installments) there are events to tie it all together.', 'This game is also fun because you can play it as a team, with up three other players, that I know of.', 'Heck many times i lag cause Blizzard servers suck.My third problem is the game gets boring fast, So on my first playthough it was fun, i took my time finished it at around 25 hours, so then i have to play on nightmare mode doing the same thing as normal mode but harder monsters, and then repeat on hell mode and repeat on inferno.', 'While it was fun for a while, its just a boring grind now.', "I tried the other classes out up to the 13 level cap the starter edition allowed and they are fun as well, but the Witch Doctor got me to get my wallet out for the full game.Now there are a lot of haters leaving horrible comments for this reason or that, but the thing is this isn't that bad of a game.", 'I started out playing DH, but now that everyone else has rerolled DH...takes the fun out of it.With game degrading mechanics all around ranging from:-max party size is 4...why...I could make a whole list of reasons why this number is ridiculous.', 'there is a hidden mechanic- merc AI is way worse than D2-mercs do no dmg, provide little support/purposeImprovements over Diablo 2:-great party system...based on DRM, and the annoying and confusing blizzard battle tag or whatever its called-graphics-sound-Nephalem Valor is a fun idea, but locks you into playing lengthy sessions, and for some reason punishes you for switching between your limited skills.', 'Im on my 2nd playthrough of the game as a monk on hell mode and the game is still really fun to me.', "Regardless it's UNFORGIVABLE for a company with the resources of Blizzard and with the testing time/metrics/sales predicitions they had at their disposal.Is this a fun game from everything I know?", 'IM playing with a Barbarian right now and im having fun killing and blowing out mobs, buy this game!', "It's a fun game that you can play for HOURS but go ahead and stop at any point in time and come back to it later.", 'I believe the negative reviewers are actually just a very small number of disgruntled people angry over server issues, and the other gamers are just too busy having fun playing the game.', 'This is another annoyance for me.Though it was fun while I played it, I am really getting disappointed with the direction of the company and its games.', "I think activision was not a good addition to blizzard - too money oriented - not enough fun gameplay orientation.Blizzard used to be a company of innovation but, where's the innovation here blizzard?", "If the single player was local - no hacking worries-broken auction house playstyle - if you don't go to the auction house to get geared up - your chance of surviving higher level play is nil at best-if you do go to the auction house for items - it ruins the fun of finding things - basically this game is a money scam and I fell for it-the game is starting to resemble WoW - I didn't want to play a point and click WoW clone BLIZZARD!!!!", "Player where it's going to be the battle of the credit cards.I will admit that I got more than my money's worth and it was fun at times, but this franchise has been ruined and this is by FAR the worst Blizzard game I have ever played.", "It doesn't mean that the fun factor goes from 5 to 3 automatically.", 'This is where the fun is in the game.', 'If you want to have some fun until the next "big game" comes out then go for it.', "But I will continue to play this game because it's fun.", 'Not something you want when you spend $60 on a game, let alone the $120 we spent.Blizzard has managed to take away some of the things that made Diablo 2 fun and different from other games.', 'A fun and addicting game.', 'Diablo 3 has been fun, but Mac users beware--while Blizzard says this game is supported for the Mac, any Mac with the Nvidia 9400M video card (which is many Macbooks, including my 2010 13in Macbook Pro) will NOT play the game satisfactorily.', "At the beginning of the game this lag seems tolerable when there are only a few monsters on the screen, but as you progress into more advanced acts the game slows down to the point where all you do is die to unseen hordes stuttering around the screen.This looks like a fun game, but now I've been forced to buy a new computer or ask for a refund--it simply cannot play on Macs with Nvidia 9400M cards!", 'This is a Diablo game mindless hack and slash which is fun to play when you can play it, I have had no problems at playing the game, however with Tuesday maintanence being an issue because the servers are down almost every week this will become a very big problem in the future.', "I'd rather play a game that is fun and addicting and have sub-par-not-the-top-of-the-line-technology-sensitive graphics.", "It ran the game on low decently, but still had some hiccups/lag.--------Conclusion--------Overall I'm having fun with the game.", "It's playable, don't get me wrong, but it' just not exciting or really fun in any way.This is not worth it.", 'I have a 2010 Macbook Pro and it runs extremely choppy, no fun to play like.', "Lastly, while connection problems occurred in the first day of release with millions of people banging on the servers, by the third day technical issues have gone away completely, I played 10+ hours yesterday without a single hiccup.This is a very fun game, even more so with a friend or a sibling, heck only reason I'm here instead of playing is because I wanted to order diablo 3 mouse and saw these terrible reviews here.Only drawback I see is that the game lost some of its gritty feel and feels abit more generic fantasy than previous games in the series, not worth taking a star away for, but I do hope Blizzard takes note.", "Though I'm guessing that there will be the eventual expansion with additional characters and levels, and I will probably be one of those people purchasing that as well.So to anyone from Blizzard who might read this, I have to say that this is the first time I have felt a little let down, in that the game does feel a little dumbed down, but it's still fun to play.", 'Still fun, just some minor annoyances that bog it down slightly.', 'I think it will be a fun game a year or two from now when it is patched and everything is rethought and the price is cut.', 'If my grammar is horrible, go ahead and have fun ripping it apart.', 'The game is fun.', "Fun to playIt's still fun to play, although it is still the same mindless, hack and slash, quasi-RPG game that the previous two are.2.", 'There is very little exploration you can do except for on the world maps, and even then there are blockades that need to be unlocked as part of some quest or another, limited your ability to explore.OVERALL=======It is still a fun game but very disappointing in many ways.', "but it's hard to imagine that anyone would do the same with this game.In the end, I have to say that while fun for awhile, D3 is ultimately a massive disappointment to fans of the series.", "Really, it's just fun plain and simple.Customization- well, this is where I a little disappointed, but I'm not going to knock a star because of it.", "Although the sounds are well-made, the repetition gets to be annoying, but the designers give a bunch of sound sliders so I can just turn the sound effects' volume down.The game has all kinds of fun little effects.", 'And that sickening DRM always online, cant play offline is a joke and insult.Playing it it actually feels less fun the D2 that I was playing all week leading up to this.', "I was playing a single-player game.Blizzard managed to spend 11 years developing a game that doesn't run properly, and isn't very fun - even when it's not shutting itself down.", "The game is reasonably fun (three stars, might push into four) but it's completely unplayable.", 'Where is the fun beyond level 40 or so when you already beat the game on two difficulties?', 'Everyone is playing solo mode because the game provides zero incentives or fun.)', 'If you like that sort of game you will still not like D3 due to the bugs and connection issues, but when (presumably later in 2012) they get their house in order, the game should be enjoyable for you.For me, D3 fails on all levels: not story-driven, and bugs and connection-issues are so frequent that it reduces the fun in single-player mode, leading to frustration.', "The game itself is fun but you can't get online to play it."]

column2: ['And I have heard the complaints that it is impossible to finish Inferno without Real-Money Auction House (which is clearly not how it is supposed to work) but up to Nightmare, using the Auction House is the only way to get enough money to be able to do the enhancements you want, craft or buy the items you covet and unlock the precious extra stash space you need.CHAINS IN NEED OF BREAKINGI withheld the second star because of the always-online requirement.', 'Just like Diablo 2, I will most likely take 2 classes up-to max level via normal difficulty and be done with Diablo 3 until the expansion gets released which I have heard is on its way.', "I don't know why exactly, but this didn't draw me back to it the way the first 2 Diablo games did.", "I think there was one item for my current class and it's stats were way under what I already had from the beginning of the game.If you can pick up Diablo 3 for cheap I'd buy it but there's no reason to pay $60 for it.", 'Yeah it requires some serious power to run on max but thats the way I like it cause no one can make games like Blizzard and Valve.Infact the Havok Engine of Diablo 3 is superior to Source Engine since valve has yet to be able to animate foliage.', 'We have come a long way from being apes thousands of years ago.In conclusion I would say its a very fun and satisfying game that will keep me going for atleast 5000 Hours or the next 10 years whichever comes first.', "Attributes are automatically distributed when you level, so the game becomes a little more results based.The drop rates are way better than months ago and Inferno difficulty is manageable than there were even 6 months ago.Multiplayer can be fun and as time went on, there are more options for those that don't participate.", 'All in all, if I had quit playing 1/2 way through I would have rated it higher.', 'So many times I tried to game the system by making my way down paths I believed would take me directly to a dungeon exit.', 'I had extremely high hopes as I grinded my way through each level.. but those high hopes began to diminish as the repetitiveness of playing each act over and over, and then over again became more and more grueling.', 'A good game community has a healthy balance of pleasing the customer and benefiting the company, but they found a way to ignore that by getting people like me sucked into a world of finding countless rares.', 'Sure you can enjoy the single player, but if you really want to experience the way Diablo was built to be played you must continue on in a second play through on a harder difficulty.', "First you can't kick someone if they aren't in the same zone as you, meaning that while teleporting to town might let you kick a normal leeching player; the ones with chinese symbols for names sitting in some obscure zone require you to travel all the way to that place just to get rid of them.", "Also playing on ultra settings wasn't very impressive, i don't know I guess i'm more of a cod/bf3 graphic guy.For now I'll stick to Starcraft II, way better game.Another note:The game took 12 gigs which isn't much for the average pc gamer but when your solid state disk has 30 gigs left its a lot.", "It is extremely fun, and I would recommend it for the casual gamer.The Good:1) Great graphics.2) Waypoints are nice to cut down on travel time so that once you reach a location there is way to get back to the town.3) You get followers on the single player game that help you fight.4) Very fun to go to new locations and meet interesting monsters and kill them.The not so good or why there are some negative reviews.1) They should probably put in some random mazes and items so that if you want to replay the game, you don't go through the same mazes.2) They decided to make inferno impossible to play and make an auction house where you need to spend real money to buy items which may still not let you win the game.I doubt I will even try inferno or spend real money on items.", 'BUT (and it really is that big of a BUT to me) there is really no other way for them to fully support their Auction House (AH) innovation.', 'Instead, they choose to deviate from it for the most part and managed to not only made a much more poorer/unbalanced game but also a way to milk every ounce of money from the player :) What a great company indeed.', 'Diablo 2 was a great game and still manages to hook players in for being more than 10 years old which is a testament to how good it was.Diablo 3, however, was a letdown and failure in every possible way, and a slap in the face to fans who have been waiting so long for the third installment.First problem, was of course the launch.', "I don't know what changed - maybe the programmers, directors, I don't know - but this game lacks the polish, strong story/lore, and fun gameplay that was the old Blizzard's hallmark.Pros: Good way to kill time, mixing abilities/gear is fun at first, looks alrightCons: Lag in a single player game is horrible, should never happen yet Blizzard refuses to fix it for unexplained reasons.", 'The only way to get decent equipment together is to buy most of it at the auction house (the gold one, I will never use the cash one).It is clear that most of the development teams focus was on how to best implement the cash auction house, and the best ways to develop the game around it so that they could best benefit from it.', 'Blizzard also changed the way stat points work in that now, all stats are useful to all character classes (for instance, dexterity modifies dodge chance, and intelligence modifies resistances), and each class has a different primary stat that modifies the amount of damage the character is able to dish out.', 'I have found myself on many occasions halting my progress simply to take in the scenery and the absurd amount of detail on the screen, or marveling at a beautiful vista, or the way a stream flows over and around rocks.', "The way random elements mesh together -- the various building blocks that make up the dungeons and the like -- is so masterfully done and so successfully delivers a handcrafted appearance that I've seen a number of players accuse the game of lacking randomized environments!", 'Now after weeks of playing the game, I simply wish I had not invested the time or the money in this game.I think the best way to describe this game is in terms of generalities.', 'You cant be disconnected in hardcore mode or you will automatically lose your character, even if the problem is caused by blizzards server you cannot request for a revive or have your 100+ hours of work returned to you, you lose not because you played the correct way but because blizzard lacks the responsibility to maintain a safe and secure network.', "I'm not promoting Torchlight 2 in any way as it appears to have cons as well (kiddie graphics), but at least it's made by the original Diablo makers and doesn't have most of the above problems associated with greed.", "Instead of turning the game into an arms race to see whether the hero or the boss could kill the other one first, you had to learn to read the boss's moves and know when to attack and when to run and bide your time.You're always thinking on your feet, reading the situation, and trying to find the best way to use your equipped skills to take down the enemies.", 'Sure.. in a way.', 'No zoom or first person perspective the way you can in Skyrim, for example.', 'Worth maybe $29.99 but no way is this game worth $60.So there you have it.', 'It is in no way a perfect game, hell half the features are not even in the game yet, but I am glad I bought it and am looking forward to the PVP and Real money AH coming soon.', 'To get this out of the way, Diablo 3 was just shy of a perfect score for the obvious reason.', "So only way to stay relevant is to stay in the auction house all day long in hopes of finding an item for a reasonable price cause there's ridiculous pricing going around like 90 mil for a ring or a good item.", 'I would argue that if this game did one thing right above anything and anyone else it was how nearly perfect the gameplay was; to send your character into the foray against hundreds of demons and watch them smash them all to literal pieces; to revel in the way passive and active skills synergized to empower each other; to listen to your character taunt the hordes after a single blow levels an entire pack.', "In the end it is a lose-lose situation (the hacker/farmers gets more gold, which eventually later on when Real Money Auction House goes online, they are there to sell you all the stolen gold) - DO NOT AT THIS MOMENT buy using real money -if they go live- until Blizzard patch/fix the problem.The difficulty ramps up not in nicer way either at some point it feels like you hit a brick wall, and again when you can't progress you're going back to Auction House.", "This is not the level of game expected of a company the size and notoriety of Blizzard.You'd be way way better off spending your $60 on say, Fallout 1, 2, 3 and New Vegas.", "This is not the level of game expected of a company the size and notoriety of Blizzard.You'd be way way better off spending your $60 on say, Fallout 1, 2, 3 and New Vegas.", 'There are way too many options to justify $60 on this game when you can make far far better use of your money elsewhere with far less frustration and likely more and longer fun.', 'Played D2 all the way through many times.Diablo 3 is great.', "Either way, it's fun and the replay value should be incredible.", "Unfortunately, huge releases like this tend to polarize the community because if it isn't the digital Jesus that they've been soiling their pants nonstop 12 years for, the nerds go berserk and the result is they give the game a score that they think it DESERVES because every single detail isn't EXACTLY the way they want it, versus what it actually is.", 'It\'s just way too easy, and not "scary" like Diablo 1.', 'Blizzard made good item drops so scarce that the only plausible way to deck yourself out in adequate gear is to go to the auction halls.My brother summed up Inferno mode pretty well:  "You paid Blizzard to have anti-fun".', 'Sad.4) multi-player would be fun but it has a big flaw which way curbs the fun quota.', "Even if someone was offering a deal on an item, there wouldn't be a way to find it unless you happened to be very specific in your search settings.GRAPHICS: Very nice.", 'Though it does seem like you have to wait longer to get the good ones on a couple of them.Gear:  Gear is handled in much of the same way as D2, and Torchlight.', "Not a vastly different game than Diablo II but way better.Plays great on a variety of computers so if you don't have the latest rig it might still work for you.", 'My husband used the guest pass key and then paid directly to Blizzard itself, so I doubt there is any way to refund that as well.', 'It\'s a great way to get our "geek" on.', 'Part of the fun was picking the way you want your character to be played, and you had to commit.', 'Many of the complaints about the game center on the infrastructure and the streamlining, so I will address those first before talking a bit about the gameplay.In terms of streamlining, the main element of this relates to the way skills are handled in the game.', 'In earlier titles in the series, a permanent attribute allocation and skill tree system was followed which permitted a greater degree of uniqueness, in theory, at the cost of a higher risk of completely gimping the character in a permanent way.', 'Trash ass system just another way for Blizzard to suck the customer dry by making you have to spend your REAL MONEY.', 'Blizzard is breaking the mould of game play where there is this ideal or "best" way of doing things.', 'It allows a kid with mommies credit card to buy their way into better gear than you have, in about 2 minutes.', 'This might be a great game, no way to tell.', "What was the point in that patch, anyway?I'm still having fun playing, and I still think co-op is the way to go.", "I'm sure someone will say that makes choosing a weapon easier, but it just makes the game make no sense, unless you look at it from the perspective of the developers not having the time or creativity to actually develop a convincing attack bonus system for casters.In a way, the makers are lucky that people are locked out of the game.", 'By the way if you have not noticed, I was and still am a huge fan of both Diablo I and II.', 'Looks like Blizz made Diablo a bit more casual just like the way they  they made MMO a casual experience in the form of WoW, to bring in more people into the band wagon.', "I think it's an interesting way to keep people playing, although I will have to laugh at the people that will actually pay money for an item you will never physically own other than in a video game.What Diablo 3 has done right:* Very easy to join games with your friends, open your Friends panel, right click the person, and invite or join to party.", "They'll either fix it (I hope and imagine) or after people have beat the game, and no longer want to sell items for a million gold two days after release (the economy is going down fast in this game... way too many resources, no gold sinks, use and sell rares, recover every gem you've ever made...)If you have the money to spare, and want to support a once brilliant company that has been bought out and is all about the money now, go ahead.", 'But there are way better games, with much more to offer, for less than this that you should really turn your attention to.-Update-Just wanted to add, that with the first hot fix, Blizzard is changing character skills and abilities, but not the in-game tooltips.', ')Yes, the way that you switch between skills is very cumbersome and involves opening up a skills window and then clicking on various tabs to select different skills and their runes (which are not physical items either) that was not intuitive at all at the beginning, and even when you get used to it still prevents easy switching of skills.', "It just makes me wonder how much of this can be attributed to the DRM system.Still, the game is beautiful and the leveling system, which I haven't even touched upon, is also addictive, simple, customizable, yet perfectly adaptable enough for the kind of builds you can do with your rare & random drops you'll see as you hack your way through thousands of insane and horrific monsters from hell.", "However, I understand some of the reasoning behind it, but know it's also a way for Blizzard to rake in more money (auction house).", 'While still fun in their own way all of these things detracted from the replay value of Dungeon Siege 3.', 'its way better then Starcraft 2 in my opinion :-)some of the reviews here are a bit negitive.', 'With the new loot system, you will get equipment that changes the way your skills behave.', "What this does is it forces you to change your build, which changes your role a bit in a multiplayer game and it changes the way you play.So now you can't experiement and find the perfect build that maximizes everything in the best way possible.", "What this does is it forces you to change your build, which changes your role a bit in a multiplayer game and it changes the way you play.So now you can't experiement and find the perfect build that maximizes everything in the best way possible.", "Now you'll be constantly changing the way you play to maximize your symbiosis between your playing potential, the skill potential of the characters and the gear's potential.It keeps things fresh and fun.>>>SHOULD YOU BUY THIS GAME?It's the most important question to ask.", "big deal.. it's not the end of the world.I've made it half way through act 2 and i'm loving the game.", 'D2 is superior to this game in every way.', 'By the way, you must have broadband.Despite 12 years of development, D3 is full of bugs and subpar graphics.', "I can't deny that in any way, haha."]
column4: ["Yes, the game does offer some gameplay features (namely, the Auction-House) to compensate for the inconvenience but they all give way to anger and frustration whenever BlLIZZARD's servers go down  and you are unable to play a Single-player game for days at a time(!).", 'Items are garbage the only way to get a good item is to brows the auction house or spend real money (which is retarded) This game does not reward you for grinding your ass off.', "Plus, I don't want to deal with security issues/hackers/bugs to the game, and alway-online is one way to fight against this.", 'Other things lost that are being demanded by fans to be brought back are a way to ID all things in stash (which was recently patched in after a year of demands), a weapon swap ability, interconnected waypoints through acts, ability to make named games in battle net, ability to fight previous bosses without having to back out of a game to start a game on that specific quest, PVP, etc.While some of those things may not matter much to everyone, there is one thing that should and that is PVP.', 'It all looks way too overused and way too much like an MMORPG instead of a bloody hack and slash horror adventure.', 'It all looks way too overused and way too much like an MMORPG instead of a bloody hack and slash horror adventure.', 'It sounds like an orchestra playing way too hard on their instruments in an attempt to make the song sound epic, and it just fails.', 'Unfortunately the cons way outweighh the pros.', 'On the first play-through the game was almost too easy and then on the next difficulty the game is way too hard.', "Or just have someone get it for you as a gift, that way you don't waste your money.", 'The way this game is right now, should be what a game looks like in the alpha.', 'This game is begging for expansions because the only way to get hours of enjoyment out of this game is by A) completing the game on every difficulty, or B) completing the game using each of the classes.', "I used to love Blizzard, but after Cataclysm and now this, I'm afraid they are on their way out as a gaming company.", "The major way you'll receive upgrades in this game is buy collecting gold/using real world money and buying items off their auction house, which leads me to my major complaint.Last week I decided to sell off all of my items and quit the game since it's not fun at all anymore (unlike Diablo 2, which was fun for over five years for me).", 'In total, trying to explore a lot and experimenting with different armor buffs and level-achieved perks, it took around 20 hours to kill Diablo (my Barbarian at level 32 at the end).I did die a few times a long the way but nothing impossible.', "I think I killed around twenty enemies in one shot that way once or twice.As I assume many reviewers have mentioned this game is online-only, even when you're solo.", 'Seems like if blizzard wants to cripple the game that way they have they should at least have such issues resolved or at least some way of smoothly adapting to it.', 'Seems like if blizzard wants to cripple the game that way they have they should at least have such issues resolved or at least some way of smoothly adapting to it.', 'These people, for the most part, work out places like Korea and China, dedicating untold hours to grinding the game in order to gather their loot which they then sell at premium prices to those too ignorant or desperate to know better than to buy them.This game was fundamentally flawed in the way it was developed, released, and is now currently being managed.', "As a long-time fan and active player of the Diablo franchise going all the way back to the release of the original in 1996, it goes without saying that I was eagerly looking forward to this third iteration of the series, and I'm happy to say that I am not the least disappointed with what the master game-craftsmen at Blizzard have turned out.At its heart, the Diablo games have always been simple (one might even argue simplistic): click monster, kill monster, collect reward.", 'you are playing blizzards way, you are not playing your way.once you see these problems clearly, there is no more fun for the game, the replay-ability is gone.', 'You cannot filter by bid value or duration left.The game is designed around a cookie cutter for total morons.Basically Blizzard tells you how to play the game every step of the way.', 'I\'m so tired of saying this... yep, the RMAHNo Elective Attributes - Yes folks, you are too stupid to do this yourself so we will do it for youJay Wilson\'s Ego - The guy must mean well, I mean it\'s not his fault if he was told from the beginning to create a Zygna gameError (Pick Number) - The battle cry of Blizzard\'s bad programming and lack of serversExploits Win Inferno - Well that used to be true... now you can just "buy" your way through if you pleaseNo Cross-Act Waypoints - Why?Diablo\'s a Girl - Sorry it needed to be saidGreed before Players - The formula executives have found to maximize profits and literally kill the true gaming experience.', 'The only way to replenish it is to give up playing on that level and go back and play a lower level all over again.This leads to the next frustration - the levels are duplicates of each other, only increasing in the toughness of the same old monsters you defeated in the prior level.', 'No, the game DOES NOT DO it that way... rather, it only says the level of the item and (up to) 4 other magic mysteries that will be added.', '*RL$AH - Just a stupid way for a greedy company to make extra cash.', 'The whole point of the game is to GRIND for loot and work your way through the higher difficulties, so this AH defeats the purpose of the game.', 'there is a hidden mechanic- merc AI is way worse than D2-mercs do no dmg, provide little support/purposeImprovements over Diablo 2:-great party system...based on DRM, and the annoying and confusing blizzard battle tag or whatever its called-graphics-sound-Nephalem Valor is a fun idea, but locks you into playing lengthy sessions, and for some reason punishes you for switching between your limited skills.', 'And they spent how long on this?The game is designed around the Auction House in every way, from item drops to the requirement to be online regardless of whether you want to play with others or not to the "difficulty" levels of the game.Oh, and Blizzard has yet to learn how to manage and anticipate problems.', "The game play lacks the challenge and death penalties of the previous ones, but every game seems to be going that way, so I can't fault Blizzard too much on that as not every gamer is a hardcore gamer these days.", 'I did the digital download, wished I bought the box (from Amazon or whoever) because the price is not much of a difference either way.', "Whether this is due to hackers or a #$@%-up on Blizzard's part is unknown at this point, but either way, whether it's due to poor security or Blizzard server incompetence, it is inexcusable to let this kind of thing happen.I most definitely will NOT be purchasing any future expansions for this game.", 'That is, Diablo 3 is, in effect, an online game, but one that can be played in a private, non-public way.', 'For people who are impacted by this decision in a negative way, these criticisms are understandable.', 'Instead it\'s left to the player to try out the abilities and their subtle changes with the "runes" that changes the way the ability acts or plays.', "At least this time they shortened the time it takes, but in a way that's a negative as well just because there is hardly 60 bucks worth of content.", 'Blizzard went exactly the wrong way: they added even more varieties of the useless items.', "This game is horrible in every way, I really couldn't possibly add on to the other hundreds of negative reviews but just wanted to add on to the numbers who say this game is terrible.", "It's just their way of getting rid of hackers and cheaters that plagued the previous versions.", 'I have completed this game on normal, and half way through nightmare, and have been bored of it ever since.', 'Blizzard is trying to innovate with the auction house concept in a way that extends the scope of the game while also providing a new source of revenue.', "* Quest leeching, while it could be annoying in public games, at least it's an easy way to level up a noob without getting slaughtered.", 'OTHER BATTLE.NET ISSUESThe game creation system for multiplayer co-op has also been simplified, in a bad way.', "but I don't really mean it in a negative way.", 'I like the improvements to game play over the previous Diablo games, in particular, the way that the town portal and identifying objects works is much improved.', "Of course they should have, but I would be more angry if I had to pay a sub for this game and lost a day of playtime so now that's out of the way lets start the review.I'm assuming most of you played the beta, so you know the general feel of the game.", "Play 400 hours and see if you feel the same way!I heard someone call this game PvAH, that's, Player vs. Auction House, and let me tell you, that's all this game is, A giant Auction House.", "You'll be met with a horde of fanboy's and others who purely want to hate you for not loving whatever scrap is tossed your way after paying to own a game you are unable to play.Online features advertised as being part of the game are non-existant, or full of bugs."]

column2: ['Play the exact same 6 hour stretch of content over and over and over again, just hoping that the right shiny thing drops for you.One addition of controversy in this game is the "Real Money Auction House", where players are able to buy and sell the shiny things they find in the game for actual money.', 'Only Blizzard could turn a 40+ hour gear-hunt into a game with more draw to it than Fallout(ok, maybe the same amount, but hey =).', 'So you have a 30 hour plot basically, but replayability is potentially very high.', "I've sat through an hour and a half of Diablo III, and honestly, it was boring.Maybe I'm a bit cynical, but I kind of saw all of this coming, from the first point hearing about the healing orbs (aka power ups) to the DRM fiasco.", "The Game overall is fantastic, it's fun, engaging, tons of action, graphics are remarkable for its style, its smooth and has a TON of replay value!People please stop giving this game a 1, this is a review OVER the game not a review wither you were allowed to sign in or not, review the game in general, it took me an hour and a half to sign in last night.", 'The graphics are okay, but not as good as they proclaimed.I played the game for about an hour, trying as hard as I could to give it a chance, and then decided I was going to go do homework instead...']
column4: ['Because it is indeed a hassle and a hindrance (just try pausing in town for longer than half and hour and see what happens).', 'If you were one of the thousands of people who skipped work to play on launch day you got a nice 6 hour break in the middle of the day when your game was unplayable.', "Besides, I don't see any real benefit to this online connection, no PVP, no guilds, no raids, etc...I can see myself playing this game for about 1-2 months to beat it since I have a small child and I can only play 1 hour or 2 a few days a week but above all I see no replay value and no portability.I also ran into the gear deficiency issue in Act I, Yes, Act I people!!!", 'Not only that we were suppose to have Real money Auction house on the 22nd of may and still dont have it.My fifth problem is, like MMOs, the game has to have server maintenance of 6-8 hour downtime.', 'Never have i played a "single player game" where i have to deal with weekly 8 hour maintenance.Lastly my sixth problem is HACKS.', "Speeding through it is possible to go through the entire game just a couple hours (there are achievements for doing each Act in under 1 hour, so that must be possible).--------Customization--------Looks is an area that's lacking.", 'If you lose that connection or the server hiccups which is quite common ( at least once an hour here ) while playing it resets you back to the start or quest.', "It wasn't the type of game that could keep me glued to the screen for hours and hours, but an hour here, a level there, and for what it was I enjoyed it.Then comes this game.", 'It took an hour and a half before I could even log in to the game, because Blizzard did not take proper actions during beta to test the servers.']

column2: ["Normally this isn't a big deal, but it would be nice to be able to play D3 on my laptop where I don't have access to the Internet.", 'Sure, Diablo III is supposed to function as a single-player experience with online play as an optional feature, causing people to question the logic of requiring a constant Internet connection.', 'But I believe that unless you really do not have Internet access during most of the time you intend on playing--in which case I would naturally recommend against your purchasing Diablo III--this is an academic point.', 'Their argument was they wanted to avoid "cookie cutter builds found on the Internet", instead they hand it to you for free.The followers you pick up on your journey each have a colourful personality, sometimes more colourful than your own character!', '--Internet connections and the need for them are becoming ubiquitous.', "But remember that you must have a high-speed Internet connection like it's an MMO -- even though you might only want to play by yourself.If you're new to this style of action RPG and you want to see what they have in store, your best bet of a great time would be with this game.", "All the negative feedback this game has gotten in just one day speak for itself.Not only this adds 0 resale value but you cannot even play your own copy if the servers go down and I'm not even referring to online play but even playing the offline campaign requires an active Internet connection.If you thought Starcraft 2 had a draconian DRM scheme then better not waste your money on Diablo 3 or wait until the price drops to $9.", 'The fact is, most of these problems could have easily been fixed by not requiring an Internet connection to play an offline game.']
column4: ["*Blizzard does require you to be constantly connected to the Internet while playing the game (you cannot play the game offline), but you do not need the Game Disc in the drive once you've registered your copy.", 'There might be an option to turn off mouse-click movement, but in the default mode it is not very good for ranged classes.- You MUST have Internet access to play this game at all.', 'Pick it back up in a month or two, and I bet things will be different!Required Internet Connection:This was kinda dumb.', 'No offline mode how pathetic.... Internet connection is mandatory and Blizzard guess what?', '-No LAN, that is right all traffic goes through their servers-Required to submit your Email Address, Birthday, Full Name, Full Address, Phone Number in order to play-Only one person can really use the game, families need one copy of the game per family member-Must stay connected to the Internet, you have to ask permission in order to play the gameOk Game, very bad product', 'If you\'re just angry at the fact that Blizzard "went there," but could certainly play D3 with its Internet requirement, don\'t deprive yourself.', 'The secret Whimsyshire "Pony level" is so whacky and wonderful it could only exist in a Blizzard game.Like I said in the beginning, 12 years of Internet hype and Blizzcon bonanzas could not stop the freight train of disappointment once the game was released.', 'So I need constant Internet access to play a one player game?', "I'll start off by saying that you cannot own this game, it's more like a life-time rental for $59 without any guarantee that it will work in the future be it two weeks from now or even tomorrow.I was skeptical of all the negative reviews about the always on Internet DRM mechanism but all I can tell is that it works in the player/customer's disadvantage.", "Yet somehow, the thing needs to constantly pull data from the Internet - even though there's no one in dungeon but you.You click, you wait, you die - often with no idea why.But let's assume for a minute that Blizzard figures out its servers eventually and the lag returns to a semi-acceptable level where the game is playable."]

column2: ["I wish I had something good to say about the game but I can't think of anything.", "Maybe this just didn't have as much magic to it or something...", 'So many scenes in this game I literally stop and gaze and gaze at its beauty not being able to move because of how beautiful the artwork is.Sometimes when playing D3 I have to stop very often sometimes for over 20 minutes and admire the scenery and wonder how can the human mind be so creative to design something like this.', "And so, people are almost forced to buy and sell items through the RMAH (I myself bought something for $45 like a sucker, because I was so frustrated one day that I wasn't finding anything decent in my many rare runs, even with 190% magic find).", 'Considering how high melee weapon drop rates are compared to ranged this is a very big issue.This is something that absolutely confounds me.', "It's pretty sad that a company wants to charge nearly $60 for something that has so many issues.", 'Then you just play something else or start over with a new character.', 'Legendary items are a joke, something to point and laugh at.', "However, there is something about Diablo 3 that just isn't fun.", 'You buy low sell high so you can buy something else.', "Either you have the appropriate gear and items to fight or you've run up against a wall and need to buy something extra in the auction house.", 'Not really something that is okay in a 2012 60$ game.I guess I got my moneys worth?', 'I can easily write a 4 page essay to accompany this.>>>>To support you (the customer) who hasnt bought this game yet and is reading these reviews in hopes of finding something worth the dollar.', "Also for something that requires you to be connected the whole time, you would thing matchmaking for public games would be better, but it's not.", 'If it updated price in real time, it would certainly give you some degree of whether to consider trying more bids or just give up on that item and go on looking for something else.', 'I guess I expected something like WoW or NWN where you have hundreds to thousands of awesome looking, unique armor and weapons (instead of generic random stuff).', "But I'll give my review none-the-less in the hopes somebody finds something fresh in it.", "Not only that, but the magical properties of many of your items are randomly generated so you don't even know if your time and effort will create something your character really benefits from.9.)", 'Due to the fact that theres 4 difficulty modes, 5 character classes, millions of items to loot, and an upcoming pvp patch, I think its safe to say this will give me something to do in my downtime over the summer,into winter, and probably into next summer as well :)And as for the mixed reviews, just ignore them :) Most of the 5 stars are just fanboys who LOVE anything related to diablo 2.', 'I have been on 11hr plane trips, and it would be nice to kill some mobs, but if I really want to game, I can plan ahead and bring something else.', 'I don\'t get a sense like i did in D2 that this is "my unique character build".- replay ability ( i fear that once i level up about 3-4 different characters there will be no need for me to start a new "build" of the same class with different stats, skills b/c i can just change or upate the skills of my current character)  something i did countless times in Diablo 2- can only handle 4 players in multiplayer (D2 had 8)Overall still very fun and i feel blizzard is really committed to making everything balanced and feels right no matter what skills you are trying to use.', 'But I found a copy of the CE and got it because Blizzard CE really are worth something eventually.', "I'm sure I was engrossed in EQ or something when Diablo 2 came out.", 'WoW is still having a major negative impact on an interesting and innovative MMO coming out, because there is so much pressure to if not be a lot like WoW, to at least sell a lot of copies like WoW.I love action RPGs, but playing Diablo III has me convinced that Blizzard will fumble with patches, the obligatory expansion, and maybe a self degrading sequel because they started with the "how can we make a ton of money off of Diablo" foot and not the "what would be something cool, new, and fun to do with the franchise" foot.', 'This clearly means something.', "I don't wanna play point and click WoW, I wanted innovation, I wanted something new...", 'Many times I will encounter errors when trying to buy something only to have my money taken and the item nowhere to be found.', "Blizzard did something right this time.Diablo III is much more accessible to many more people, but the whole of the game isn't sacrificed just for accessibility.", 'The latter is something Blizzard certainly seems determined to avoid, and successfully I believe.', "If this particular change doesn't profoundly disappoint you, you'll enjoy Diablo III as much as you did Diablo II, unless you played that one for so long that something of the mad joy of slaughtering legions of monsters and always chasing the next better piece of gear died in you years ago.Let's not forget about the elephant in the room, of course.", 'I find that I love the magical powers, I have played the wizard, which was pretty awesome, and then I played the witch doctor until I unfortunately died on level 8 of hardcore.Finally something that my boyfriend and I can do together and have fun doing.', 'D3 does away with the attribute/skill point system in favor of something more streamlined.', "Each skill can be modified with a rune that will change how the skill behaves, the variance can be quite extreme making the same skill seam like you have many different skills.Combat is you click on something, it dies, you repeat that endlessly in the hopes they'll drop better loot.", 'While you never had a choice in previous games, it is something people have come to expect in modern games.For stats, they are assigned automatically.', "Also, after selling 50 items..you can only afford 1 weapon items.. yeah.. something isn't right here.", "I never had to buy anything from shop as I'll find something better in next 10 minute of playing.3) GraphicsMany say better graphic than Diablo 2.", 'In fact, I waited a few days just in-case something like this would happen and I was right.', 'In fact, my gaming rig is something that I just put together; ATI Radeon 6XXX series, AMD Quad Core 3.6, 12gb of RAM, two 5400 rpm WD, a cheap ASUS mobo, and I even have a cheap Belkin USB wireless antenna and an old beatup Linksys router that I bought in 2003.', "They're more of a novelty thing than something that you could rely on when overwhelmed with tons of mobs.", 'I thought maybe the chat thing was something that would make it worthwhile and was treated to Superbubbaz and Cooldoodz23 performing 12 year old wow like trade chat - that was definitely not a positive addition.', "There just something really awesome about the game-play that kept me coming back for more and the graphics are enough of an improvement that it feels new - not cutting edge but good enough.There's been a lot of complaints about this game needing a constant internet connection even when playing as a single player game.", 'But you think in 13 years Blizzard/Activision would be able to come up with something that prevented this nonsense?', 'Very few bugs and awesome mechanics.The bigger invetory is also a welcome addition.Having extra pieces of equipent adds to my addiction.Your character constantly learns something new while leveling.', "Companies are first and foremost a business, yes they need to adhere to their fans, but in the end their running a business so they'll do what's really in their best interest while providing the consumer with something they'll hopefully enjoy.", 'But - look at the bright side - if you quit smoking cigs - then you will wind up ahead cuz your pissed about wasting your $60 and gotta do something positive to make up for it.', 'For that you need a lot more than Blizzard has given us with this title.My final say is this: if you really need a new Action RPG and cannot wait for something better, then go for it.']
column4: ["Needless to say, it can be fun to grind eq hoping for that small gain in power, but it's VERY repetitive grinding the same areas over and over and crafting LOTS of times to get something decent (which requires grinding for resources).Blizzard did a lot of work revamping this game and many improvements were made (I added 2 stars as a result).", "And while you may not like that you can't play Diablo on your laptop during your wifi absent family vacation, Blizzard doesn't like that pricks out their steal something they worked hard to make.", 'There is no option to turn the forced dialogue off and just about everything has something to say.', 'What we got instead was something very pointless they decided to call Brawling which is basically a very watered down version of what they had promised us.', "There is just something about the hellish/demonic angle of the game, the utter fun of hacking'n'slashing all these demons into a red gooey mess with body parts flying everywhere and of course the shiny loot gathering.", 'Blizzard is constantly changing and adding new content so every time you beat the game and play again something new is there.', "If you're expecting something mind-blowing, you may be disappointed, but I found this one thoroughly enjoyable.", 'You just buy something from the auction house every few levels, and never ever use the things you find.', 'This is something I expect from all RPGs and this one lacks it...big time.- Limited playable classes.', "For those who are expecting something else, well...  you'll be disappointed.", 'I like the skills and functionality of the DH at least but find myself with very little interest in even playing the other classes just due to my frustrations thus far.In short, I will likely shelve the game and find something that I get enjoyment out of an not something that makes me want to smash my computer.', 'I like the skills and functionality of the DH at least but find myself with very little interest in even playing the other classes just due to my frustrations thus far.In short, I will likely shelve the game and find something that I get enjoyment out of an not something that makes me want to smash my computer.', "Play the game till it's no longer fun, then play something else.", 'They should have just named this World of Warcraft: Heroes or something like that because its exactly what this game is.', 'Systems that run over 1 GB of video memory still experience framerate stutter and tearing on a game with graphics less intense than something made 5 years ago.', "I like competition, but this is jouvanileScheduled Maintenance Overdose - Can't log on to play single-player game cause Blizzard is always fixing something they brokeInferno Brick Wall - This is just another tactic to lead people to the RMAHDesigned for Consoles - Clunky and crappy.", "Yes, of course there are, but they won't be playing Diablo 3Created Korean Jobs - We'll see if Korea's new anti-Blizzard law sticks.Blues rock Legendaries - What the crap are they called legendaries for?Skill System overly-simplified - No sacrifices, no stats, no choices other than picking 1 of 20 lame skills with several variations... yawnDesigned for grandkids-grandma's - unfortunately this WoW-like approach ruined it for the rest of us by over-simplifying everything10 Years Development - Was this an intern job or something?", "Truly it's working as intended when it frustrates you into the RMAH.The sad Truth - Anyone who says otherwise from anything written above is selling something.", "I shouldn't have the game kicking me out every 5 minutes when I'm just getting up to get the kids something to eat or change a diaper or whatever.So my 1-star rating is actually a 3-star rating for good gameplay (maybe even 4 stars if your expectation really just was for an updated version of exactly the same recipe, no surprises), minus two stars as a punitive measure for hobbling the overall experience so badly with the damnable DRM.Oh look... battle.net kicked me off again while I was writing this.", 'To me this goes against the tons of variations you can choose from (Yes this is the hardest difficulty, but it was still something promised before the game came out).', 'My only wish is that somebody would design a game, something similar to D&D; Online, that had a random scenario generator that could make huge worlds, but was free to play with others online, that is, no monthly fees.', 'Why would a gaming company add something that negates the point of their game?', 'Whatever torrent scheme they have running just seems to constantly fail at what it is doing or something.', "I very highly doubt they'll patch it in, but maybe early adopters or CE purchasers will get lucky or something =/", 'I had to get on here and write something positive because of all the negative BS on here.', 'Why put something in the game that will cost us money to make, when we can let people rely on some other piece of software like SKYPE to do it.', "I'm completely shocked that they have released something as bad as this.", 'But if you needed this game to be a clone of Diablo 2, then find something else to do.', 'Not something you want when you spend $60 on a game, let alone the $120 we spent.Blizzard has managed to take away some of the things that made Diablo 2 fun and different from other games.', 'The other is a standard HP laptop with a Core i7 and a Radeon 6000m something series video card.', "It's really something that gamers should rebel over.Bad:The game itself is nothing to write home about.", "It is simply unplayable (lag, disconnects, 40 minutes of lost progress) at random times, and that's why my review is 1 star instead of 2 stars.Until then, save your money, and buy something else.", 'I played DII for a long time, on and off, and eventually raised a sorceress up to level 80 something after about two years.', "If the servers go down from time to time, we'll decide to go read a book, take a walk, or get something done and come back in a little bit.", 'I will play all the difficulty levels though and the expansion packs, which should say something about the casual playability of this game.', "I couldn't believe that Diablo came so soon, and when he died I was wondering if there would be another act or something, but alas, it just ended with a whimper and yet another cutscene.3/5 for mindless fun2/5 for overall quality of the game********************(UPDATED (5/20/2012)********************BOTTOM LINE===========So, I got my character up to level 50 and finished D3 on nightmare difficulty and...", 'The game will rewind in time like something glitched out and it restored from 600ms back.', "I'm completely shocked Blizzard would do something like this."]

column2: ["for $20, this is a great game.i got this game years after its release when it's on sale for 20 bucks.", "i think over the years, Blizzard has perfected the click-to-death Diablo franchise to be a game that's easy enough for anyone to pick up, while maintaining the challenges that hardcore gamers like myself love about the franchise.", 'Someone needs to tell marketers, just because a castle sells on Ebay from Ultima Online some years back for a grand, does not mean that millions of gamers who buy games without monthly fees will buy virtual items for real money.', "It was quit fun, but the only thing we didn't like was that we waited years to get this game for it to be kind of short.", 'I have played Diablo 2 and its expansion many years ago..I think almost a decade ago and had great fun with it.', 'And coming to play Diablo 3 so many years later I found it to be a worthy successor to Diablo 2.', "They produced and excellent update to the diablo serious...even if we had to wait over 5 years for it.It's very well done and I can easily recommend it to those RPG fans out there!", 'Because lets be real its BLIZZARD, they place gameplay over graphics and their games last over 12 years at a time so why not go the extra mile so the visuals will age well?', 'We have come a long way from being apes thousands of years ago.In conclusion I would say its a very fun and satisfying game that will keep me going for atleast 5000 Hours or the next 10 years whichever comes first.', 'We have come a long way from being apes thousands of years ago.In conclusion I would say its a very fun and satisfying game that will keep me going for atleast 5000 Hours or the next 10 years whichever comes first.', 'Everyone who played the last two games were either in high school or college at the time and are now in their 30′s and 40′s. 12 years in the making with so much turmoil and history to write a novel about.', 'I have played many games, I have played WoW for 7 years, swtor, Lotro, rift, gw2, etc.', "I would suggest to Blizzard, make a good game quicker (not 10 - 12 years development time), and don't try to ruin it with auction house, and you will have more happy customers who will buy more games.", "As a matter of fact, having been burnt by the horrible game of Star Wars: The Old Republic, I did not even buy Mass Effect 3 (I read gamers' reviews first and it turns out not buying it was a good decision) and, most certainly, I will never preorder ANY game (no matter how much I want to preorder X-COM: Enemy Unknown).Over the last 5 years or so, game publishers have repeatedly lied to us, created incredible hype around their products, raised their prices to unbelievable, unprecedented levels and sold us TRASH... and WE bought said trash.", 'Cain must be like 500 years old I think.', "I've stopped playing MMOs for less!Graphically this game shows its long production cycle - maybe if this game came out ten years ago it might be impressive.", 'Diablo 2 was a great game and still manages to hook players in for being more than 10 years old which is a testament to how good it was.Diablo 3, however, was a letdown and failure in every possible way, and a slap in the face to fans who have been waiting so long for the third installment.First problem, was of course the launch.', "We have wait for 10 years, It's so amazing.Perfect story, perfect interface, perfect everything.Diablo III is the best game this year, or a few years.", "We have wait for 10 years, It's so amazing.Perfect story, perfect interface, perfect everything.Diablo III is the best game this year, or a few years.", 'This game was over 11 years in the making and when it finally was released it was filled with bugs, exploits, server issues, and no single player offline mode.', 'Completely dissapointed after waiting 10+ years.', 'I waited 10 years for this "amazing" game!', "Okay okay okay, I think I finally got itGraphics Washed Out - Titan Quest had better graphics 6 years ago, but pre-generation graphics seems to be Blizzard's battle cry so I guess that was expectedLack of Servers - Another method of maximizing profits at the expense of their customers again.Worst Gaming-Launch Ever - Only to be surpassed by their next gaming launchCraft System Broken - Too expensive to justify any of the crap it poos out on youIsn't Diablo 3 - It's a wolf in Diablo's clothing.", 'The game is fine for a first walkthrough, you will get about 30-50 hours of a good expirience, the problem is that when you get games as DIABLO 3, you do it for it to last years, not some 30 hours.', 'You think people who have been gaming for years get hacked this easily?', 'Then it became the sale of in-game vanity items for real cash, in a game that already charges $40 for an expansion every 2 years on top of the existing $15 monthly fee.In Starcraft 2, there was surprisingly very little milking of the product on the surface.', "I guess all these years later it is getting harder for D&D; stories to vary much but I'd sure like to see someone try a novel approach.6.)", "mind you that is today, I can't imagine 4-5 years from now.-bosses only drop loot the first
